revision.text: ==English== {{rfi|en}} ===Etymology=== {{compound|en|yellow|fin}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun|yellowfin|s}} # Any of various fish with yellow fins. ## especially, [[yellowfin tuna]] ({{taxlink|Thunnus albacares|species|ver=170119}}, in family [[Scombridae]]) ## {{vern|yellowfin bream}}, any of several species in family [[Sparidae]] ## {{vern|yellowfin croaker}} ({{taxlink|Umbrina roncador|species|ver=180702}}, in family [[Sciaenidae]]) ## {{vern|yellowfin cutthroat trout}} (â€ {{taxlink|Oncorhynchus clarkii macdonaldi|subspecies|ver=180702}}, in the family [[Salmonidae]]) ## {{vern|yellowfin fairy wrasse}} ({{taxlink|Cirrhilabrus flavidorsalis|species|ver=180702}}, in family [[Labridae]]) ## {{vern|yellowfin grouper}} ({{taxlink|Mycteroperca venenosa|species|ver=180702}}, in family [[Serranidae]]) ## {{vern|yellowfin madtom}} ({{taxlink|Noturus flavipinnis|species|ver=180702}}, in family [[Ictaluridae]]) ## {{vern|yellow-fin perchlet}} ({{taxlink|Ambassis elongatus|species|ver=180702}}, in family {{taxlink|Ambassidae|family|ver=170119}}) ## {{vern|yellowfin pike}} ({{taxlink|Dinolestes lewini|species|ver=190702}}, in family {{taxlink|Dinolestidae|family|ver=170119}}) ## {{vern|yellowfin sea bream}}, any of several species in family [[Sparidae]] ## {{vern|yellowfin surgeon}} ({{taxlink|Acanthurus xanthopterus|species|ver=180702}}, in family [[Acanthuridae]]) ## {{vern|yellowfin whiting}} ({{taxlink|Sillago schomburgkii|species|ver=180702}}, in family {{taxlink|Sillaginidae|family|ver=170119}}) ====Translations==== {{trans-top|any fish with a yellow fin}} {{trans-mid}} {{trans-bottom}} {{trans-see|yellowfin tuna}} ===References=== * {{pedia}} [[Category:en:Acanthuroid fish]] [[Category:en:Catfish]] [[Category:en:Croakers]] [[Category:en:Percoid fish]] [[Category:en:Scombroids]] [[Category:en:Serranids]] [[Category:en:Sparids]] [[Category:en:Wrasses]]
